definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Pectins are composed of a galactose derivative, chitin of a glucose derivative.
sentences.chinese: 果胶是由半乳糖变异体和葡萄糖变异体角素构成。

sentences.english: I'm a no frills kind of gal.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个没有低价种半乳糖。

sentences.english: Alkaline pectinases break down complex pectin into simple molecules like galacturonic acids.
sentences.chinese: 碱性果胶酶分解复杂的果胶成小分子如半乳糖醛酸。

sentences.english: Lactose and galactose could inhibit the haemagglutination activity of snail agglutinin.
sentences.chinese: 其凝集活性能被半乳糖和乳糖抑制。

sentences.english: Selective acetylation of tri-O-acetyl-C-aryl-D-gluco-and galacto-pyranosides was reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了葡萄糖和半乳糖碳苷的选择性乙酰化。

sentences.english: Ruptures of the pectic main chains rich in galacturonic acid occurred.
sentences.chinese: 富含半乳糖醛酸的果胶主链断裂。

sentences.english: Gal is the product of Shanghai No.
sentences.chinese: 半乳糖，上海试剂二厂出品。

definition: pentose (CH2O)5, monosaccharide with five carbon atoms, such as ribose 核糖[he2 tang2]
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
